name: Classic Southern Deviled Eggs
author: FoodJunkie
summary: This classic Southern recipe has been a favorite in my family for years. It combines the simplest ingredients, including sweet pickle relish, perfectly for a picnic, cookout, or family dinner.
ingredients: 3 tablespoons yellow mustard, or more to taste
¼ teaspoon ground black pepper, divided
directions: Remove egg yolks and place into a mixing bowl
Add mayonnaise, vinegar, relish, mustard, sugar, cayenne, and black pepper to the yolks; mix well with a fork
Place mixture into a small resealable zip-top bag and snip the end off one of the corners
Pipe mixture into the egg whites
Sprinkle tops with more black pepper and cayenne
